text.text_translated:
Most people have dreams every night.
After they are ten years old, they have four to six dreams.
That is about 2,000 dreams every year.
So, when a person is 80 years old, they have had many dreams.
Maybe 140,000 dreams in their life.
We forget most of our dreams.
We forget 95 to 99 of every 100 dreams.
But we still remember a few thousand dreams.
Sometimes, we have a dream.
Then, something similar happens in real life.
This is probably just by chance.
This happens more when the dream is about normal things.
These are things that happen every day.
